Package fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.tests

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComputerMonitor
    The class ComputerMonitor is a component used in the test to act as a receiver for state data notifications coming from a computer.
    ProcessorMonitor
    The class ProcessorMonitor implements a monitor component receiving data from processor components.
    TestApplicationVM
    The class TestApplicationVM deploys an ApplicationVM running on a Computer component connected to a ComputerMonitor component and then execute a test scenario.
    TestApplicationVM.Request  
    TestApplicationVM.RequestionNotificationConsumer  
    TestsComputer
    The class TestsComputer deploys a Computer component connected to a ComputerMonitor component and then execute one of two test scenarii on the simulated computer.
    TestsProcessor
    The class TestsProcessor deploys a Processor component connected to a ProcessorMonitor component and then execute one of two test scenarii on the simulated processor.
